FileFormat.FormatDescription: A cue sheet file is used to describe how the tracks within optical media are laid out and may contain further metadata. They are plain text files.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF max offset 1024: seeking 'FILE', ' TRACK 01', ' INDEX 01 ' minutes 00-99 [30:39][30:39] ':' seconds 00-59 - [30:35][30:39] ':' frames 00-75 - [30:37][30:39]. Currently set to up to 1024 bytes between each element. These offsets and indents are not strictly defined and may need to be refined further as we encounter further examples.
